The Appellants were sentenced as follows on 03/04/2018:

column2: Each Appellant was sentenced to 7 1/2 years rigorous imprisonment
and a fine of Rs.1500/- with a default sentence of 03 months rigorous
In addition, the learned High Court Judge had directed the Appellants
to  pay  a  compensation  of  Rs.150,000/-  each  to  PW1  with  a  default
